Please, select one of the following options:
e) Enable
d) Disable
s) Position Sensor Calibration
m) Map Position Sensor to motor position
p) Set a position
c) Enter in the Control Loop
Motor disable!
Move the EduExo to 0 degrees. Press c to continue
Move the EduExo to 90 degrees. Press c to continue

Position sensor calibrated!
